documents.document:
Welcome

Harrow pep. Well i am not really good with blogs. Just want to say welcome to my page nd i try to update this more often as i can. Just drop me a line or mail and ill try to reply back.
Weather ws great today. Enjoyed it by cleaning my room and doing house work. i didnt play much today. i am downloading Rappelz still dnt know who that works but looks cool.
HOpe every one have a safe and enjoyable merry christmas and happy new year.

Good Morning

Well good morning all. HOw is ur day going? Mine just started. hmm sunny and abit cool which is good. Well .... our company made the new again. Way da go telecom.

Any who. that has nothing to do with what i do but ya feel bad. Looking for a job is kinda hard in this town. So i am going to go back to study and finish off my papers and try a stable job. i dnt like fixed contracts.

It could be worse really. Holiday season is coming and pep are looking around for jobs so it shouldnt be that hard.
ill get a better one. Man if i read my blog as a strannger id say boring!!!...so sorry if it is . my life is that exciting. oh occasional calls u get are funny but we cant talk about them its confidential sorry.

But there are some NUT CASES out hea in NZ trust me deal with them alot.haha
thats all for today. Take care all. and ty for reading /coming to ma page

Sup Pep

Ahh 1 day off so nice .. not!! this shift sucks like no tomorrow. haha well what can i say yesterday ws entertaining for me. My manager has a thing for me (bad way) every time i say or do something she shoots up her chair and comes running Nikita what ws that??!!! be professional.. ffs if a kid is going "what ?" what??"" and swearing at u and all u doing is just raising ur voice so he can hear u and saying what u suppose to say! how is that not professional...

grrrr.... she needs a communications course to learn really. i have a certificate in that i can teach her!!. Half the CSP (operator) raise their voice most of the time i dnt see them getting told off.

I just cant wait to leave that job or move on. And they do the survey about why staff leave the company.. Dah!!! ... look at ur TM first.

ok enough bitching.
** takes a deep breath ** ** breaths out** relax. more tomorrow. haha
i am sure pep have something better than me happening in their life.

Just take it as it comes. Life is too short to worry abt pep like them i guess.

good after noon

Harrow all. so how is every one doing ? all ready and excited about this christmas haha i am kinda but not really. its now become just like ay other holiday realy. working and just spending time with family

But ya not like it used to feel. But i guess it how u make ur day is the way u will feel. so make it exciting and enjoyable. and eat and have lots of fun.

Take care too dnt put ay one in harms way. Look after urself and ur loved ones.

well thats all for now. take care bibi.

hey all

harrow every one. well what can i say. i am touched by some visitors to my page saying i am sexy i would like to say "thank you".

that is just my face if u sw the whole package i dnt thing u would say the same.heheh
trust me i need alot of work dnt to my body! a lot. being size 12 is not fun for me =(( when i used to be size 10.
i have being trying diet and exercise even thou i dnt like doing work outs. thanks to ma best friend cheral.ahhh

Read this

This is should probably be taped to your bathroom mirror where one could read it everyday. You may not realize it, but it's 100% true.

1. There are at least two people in this world that you would die for.
2. At least 15 people in this world love you in some way.
3. The only reason anyone would ever hate you is because they want to be just like you.
4. A smile from you can bring happiness to anyone, even if they don't like you.
5. Every night, SOMEONE thinks about you before they go to sleep.
6. You mean the world to someone.
7. You are special and unique.
8. Someone that you don't even know exists loves you.
9. When you make the biggest mistake ever, something good comes from it.
10. When you think the world has turned its back on you take another look.
11. Always remember the compliments you received. Forget about the rude remarks.

So..........If you are a loving friend, send this to everyone, including the one that sent it to you. If you get it back, then they really do love you.

And always remember....when life hands you Lemons, ask for tequila and salt, and call me over!

Good friends are like stars.......You don't always see them, but you know they are always there.

'Whenever God Closes One Door He Always Opens Another, Even Though Sometimes It's Hell in the Hallway'

I would rather have one rose and a kind word from a friend while I'm here than a whole truck load when I'm gone.

RETURN TO SENDER
Forward to all your friends, including me. ! And don't tell me you're
too busy for this. Don't you know the phrase 'stop and smell the flowers'? See how many 'bouquets' you end up with!

I dnt know what to do!!

Ok. i have a bf who i have being for almost 2 years now. he is very nice and treats me right and every thing a girl can ask for. sure there are ups and dwns.
He told me he doesnt love me as much as i want him to love me. Should i realy care abt that ?? i mean its better than being in a relationship and not being loved at all. He also said he doesnt see us getting married / have kids. He doesnt know what he want!!
what should i do?? i love him too much to leave him his ma 4 and i cant stand another heart break. last one ws so bad i considered killing myself. I know i know its not worth taking your life but when it hurts u just dnt think about those things.

He loves me but ya i know i dnt really want to hear "leave him honey there are plenty in the sea!!" speech but how do u let go of something u learnt to love with all your heart?

Help ay advice will be appreciated.
love nikita and ty for taking time in reading this

what a year!!??

well after reading all the comments i have decided i am just going to concentrate on my health and my career. I have started looking for new jobs i really want to go to australia. about my boyfriend well i have also decided i am going to think positive and try to work it out. He will either learn to love me or we will just be together.
Work wise i am being trained in another dept. so thats a good thing. I am happy at the moment. I noticed if i start thinking about relationships and babys it just makes me unhappy and causes problems. If a guy is not ready his not ready you can never rush babys either way.

i would like to thank every one who gave me advice i really appreciate it.from now on i will do my best to think positive and move forward.

Have a lovely day /weekend.

SOrry

Hey guys I am sorry if i havnt being replying or said hellow to any one yet. I have being sorting out some issues i hve with my flatmats and work stuff. but i am good and going strong. i did hit abit of a brick wall but i found a way around it so ya Me doing well

Hope every one is having a good weekend and enjoying their life.
catch up with you guys sometime. =D

my tooth

my tooth .. i feel on my face flat and chiped my tooth.. hehehe .. so funny when i think about it lol.
OUCH yes.. lol.. how is every one today? I am good just at work its borning hate working hea. cant wait to move to aussy.
What should i hve to lunch hmmmm? oh wait i dnt have any money heheh pay day next week. ya fortnight pays sucks.

Who plays world of warcraft in nagrand realm. drop me a line. if ya need a healer heheh Hfrapriest 41 or hunter Bloodhuntres 70

TOday

y hello pep how is every one doing? i is good just working

winter is apon us and i hate it i want to run to australia ad dame my sister .. taking her time gees ..
well i have all my warm clothes with me heater right next to me *turns it on**
yeah.. let the winter come
BOO YA

so whats new nothing really still being a nerd playing world of warcraft its awesome hehe i love it
My mummy came to visit me dame i forgot her birthday sorry mummy well can u blame me she has two birthday dnt ask its a long story . but she celebrates it and i mix up the month around so forgt the first one lol
but ya 2nd one is in may that i know lol so ya woowhoo i wont forget that this time

so whats a good movie out? ay thing new .. drop a line i dnt mind its interesting to talk to some nice pep there are some that start talking abt sex and their dick size i say "fuck off i am nt interested in that "
i like to get to the person personality first and i only want friendship

Winter

i dnt like winter and its hea ... my hands are so numb....
well i am good ty just busy with wow and stuff. Wwelll...... i got my blankey hehe and my heater at home
just need my computer and wow and i am all warm and fussy. Being stressed out alot lately and its nothing to do with bf
its my friends.

ok hea is the story
This guy used to stalk me so ya .. it ws a good thing thou. we did end up just seeing each for a bit. but than we couldnt stand each other we gt very argumentive. After a while i moved so i lost connect with him for 5 years
now after five years his back and his with a girl. who has a baby girl.
ok hea it gets interesting .. he asked me to be his friend and blah blah... well i tried to be his friend but its impossible. he said his changed but id nt think so.
He called me at 11pm 2 nites ago.. saying he ws having domestics when he asked to help him
his gf's father ws causing shit abt him and his daughter being together .. and the gf is aggresive. He told me while he ws talking to me that he ws in the car cold so i told him to go get something warm. and he went mental at me.. thats the best advice u can give me.
i mean .. he ws complain abt being in the cold andin the car. than i told him to go a nd have a talk try to explain it to her .. he went nuts again ...
now to me thats ws it .. i mean if u want advice u either take it or leave it ..but u dnt sit there and insult me ..and call me idiot or that i am not being a friend.. ffs i picked up my phone when i ws asleep .. what else do u want me to do .. drive for 8hours just to get to u ..

now tell me what should i have done. this what i did i told him again... to go talk to her or stay in the car and freeze but he has to sort it out. other wise there is another option to leave her if he cant deal / handle it.and hung up

should i have told him that every thing will be alright or what ..its so frustrating i have my own shit and prob
